lines.text: There's something awfully screwy about this fight, or my name isn't Laramore... and it isn't!
Sportsman? Listen, sport! You don't know the meaning of fair play! What chance has a poor helpless fluffy little winged creature like me against you?
[taking away each item from Elmer as he mentions it]

You, with your bullets, and your shotgun, and your knife, and your duck call, and your hunting coat, and your hunting dog, and all kinds of stuff like that there! What protection have I got? A bulletproof vest, I suppose!
[parts his feathers to reveal just that]
Heh-heh. How did that get there?
All wight, all wight, I'll take that over there.
You *sure* this is the one you want?
[hits Elmer with an enormous hammer that had been held in his other hand but hidden behind his back]
And... here's round one comin' up!
1, 3, 9, 10, YOU'RE OUT! The winner and new champion, Daffy Duck!
I'm not one to compwain, Mr. Wefewee, but I thought you said no WOUGH STUFF! Nunna THIS
